definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
to evaporate/(of cooking) to steam/torch made from hemp stalks or bamboo (old)/finely chopped firewood (old)
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: The addition of steam inhibits the production of hydrogen cyanide.
sentences.chinese: 水蒸氣的加入會抑制氰化氫的產率。

sentences.english: The volatile oils of Zanthoxylum schinifolium were extracted by water vapor distillation.
sentences.chinese: 採用水蒸氣蒸餾法提取精製香椒子中的揮發油。

sentences.english: A stoma is an opening through which carbon dioxide goes in and oxygen and water vapor escape.
sentences.chinese: 氣孔是二氧化碳進入而氧氣和水蒸氣逸出的開口。

sentences.english: The influence of treating conditions in steam on the properties of residuum hydrocracking catalyst carrier was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了水蒸氣處理對渣油加氫催化劑載體性質的影響。

sentences.english: Our breath is misting up the car windows.
sentences.chinese: 我們呼出的氣漸漸給汽車的窗戶上蒙上一層水蒸氣。

sentences.english: These winds can transport large amounts of water vapour over hundreds of kilometres.
sentences.chinese: 這些風可以把大量水蒸氣運輸到數百公里外的地方。

sentences.english: The essential oil was extracted from Citrus aurantium'Daidai' by steam distillation.
sentences.chinese: 採用水蒸氣蒸餾法從代代花中提取揮發油。

sentences.english: Steam condenses to water when it touches a cold surface.
sentences.chinese: 水蒸氣觸及冷的表面即凝結成水。

sentences.english: METHODS The essential oil was extracted from alpiniakatat sumadai hayata by steam distillation.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用水蒸氣蒸餾法從豆蔻仁中提取揮發油。

sentences.english: Eventually , the water stored as vapor in the atmosphere will condense to liquid again.
sentences.chinese: 最後，大氣中儲存的水蒸氣將再次凝縮爲液體。

sentences.english: Experimental study of biomass powder(phoenix tree leaves) gasification which using the vapour as catalyst.
sentences.chinese: 用水蒸氣進行梧桐葉粉體的催化氣化實驗研究。

sentences.english: Water vapor goes through my skin.
sentences.chinese: 水蒸氣會穿過我的皮膚。

sentences.english: Clouds are formations of condensed water vapour.
sentences.chinese: 雲是由凝聚的水蒸氣構成的。

sentences.english: The total oil of the mint microencapsulations was measured by steam distillation method.
sentences.chinese: 採用水蒸氣蒸餾法測定了微膠囊化薄荷油的總油。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish the optimum conditions for the vapour distillation of the garlic oil.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索水蒸氣蒸餾法提取大蒜油的最佳工藝。

sentences.english: Methods The volatile oil was obtained from PPFA by steam distillation.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用水蒸氣蒸餾法從枳殼中提取揮發油。
